QuestData.Title: Trust No One
QuestData.Description: Nothing is the same since I returned. There is always whispering - everywhere, whispering. Maraad cannot see it, but there are even traces of fel energy here in Elodor. We have been infiltrated!$b$bI must attend to the Exarch Council, but I need you to investigate. Follow the traces of fel energy that I will illuminate. If there are truly traitors in our midst, they will have to have some sort of hideout. Find it! I will wait for you with the other Exarchs.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Maladaar's trail to verify that Elodor has been infiltrated.
QuestData.RewardText: A flesh-bound book lies on an unholy altar. Your skin crawls. Maladaar was right!
